mapper.select: SELECT rn, orderNo, orderDate, memberNo, orderRecipientName, orderRecipientPhone, orderStatus, orderDeliveryCharge, orderPoint, orderTotal FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY orderNo DESC) AS rn, orderNo, orderDate, memberNo, orderRecipientName, orderRecipientPhone, orderStatus, orderDeliveryCharge, orderPoint, orderTotal FROM `ORDER`) AS derived WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
